title: skin
body: how to get a skin for free

replies.body:
If you haven't already, there are some great promotions that grant you free skins. I've listed them below:

- You can get Alistar and his Unchained skin for free by subscribing to our YouTube channel: www.youtube.com/user/RiotGamesInc

- You can get Tristana and her Riot Girl skin for free by following us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends

- We're currently offering Garen and Dreadknight Garen for our Twitter followers (Choose your region, then click the link): http://woobox.com/scrx56

Let me know if you have any questions about these promotions.

Turn off your computer, walk outside, walk back inside, walk back outside and do 100 push ups, 100 situps, 100 squats, 10km running, play dark souls 1,2,3 blindfolded, or yaknow just do those ads that spam your inbox afterwards.
